    try (Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in)) {

        long n = scanner.nextLong();

        int sqrt = (int) Math.sqrt(n);

        int answer =0;

        for (int i=2; i <= sqrt; i++) {

            int count =0;

            while (n %i ==0) {

                n /=i;

                count++;

            }

            for (int j=1; count -j >=0; j++) {

                count -=j;

                answer++;

            }

        }

        if (n>1) {

            answer++;

        }

        System.out.println(answer);

    }

}
